item.description:
I've been working on setting up one or two workshops on the uses of herbs in cooking. I am still working on this. In the meantime, the Ct Herb Association is hosting their annual HerbFest CT. The link takes you to their flyer.

Let's put together a group and go to this event. It looks like a good time with a smell good flavor to it

!

http://www.herbfestct.com/

 

The cost is $5 and children under 10 are free.

Those who want to car pool can make private arrangements or meet at my house at 8:30AM and we will go from here. Please let me know if you are meeting at my place to car pool so no one gets left behind.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one in a wheelchair looking like me
item.name: HerbFest CT
